
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18865040" title="发布于 2025-05-07 20:29">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架2025年4月简报</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202156986-1617478914.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>公众号每月定期推广和分享的C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架（每周至少会推荐两个优秀的项目和框架当然节假日除外），公众号推文中有项目和框架的详细介绍、功能特点、使用方式以及部分功能截图等（打不开或者打开GitHub很慢的同学可以优先查看公众号推文，文末一定会附带项目和框架源码地址）。注意：排名不分先后，都是十分优秀的开源项目和框架，每周定期更新分享<span>。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>💡简报Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>🔔简报GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247511078&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=9d2c0e2542ce782bcf82b3b53c86403f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">🎯全面的C#/.NET/.NET Core面试宝典（永久免费）</span></a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>EverythingToolbar</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;EverythingToolbar 是一款基于 .NET 开源（MIT License）、免费的实用辅助工具，它可以将 Everything 添加到 Windows 任务栏，从而取代了 Windows 传统的文件搜索功能，提供比 Windows 内置搜索更优越、更快速的搜索体验。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/srwi/EverythingToolbar" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="wx_text_underline" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/srwi/EverythingToolbar</span></a></span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512072&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=3b3eefffa51e0e472c5609f886675b47&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/oouJHTJPKeT2dJEAt6NDGQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202416549-1590520843.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202421186-1502403898.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>MCP C# SDK</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;MCP C# SDK 是由 Model Context Protocol（MCP）官方推出的 C# 软件开发工具包（SDK），它使 .NET 应用程序、服务和库能够快速实现与 MCP 客户端和服务器进行交互。MCP是一个开放协议，它标准化了应用程序如何为大型语言模型（LLMs）提供上下文，并实现了 LLMs 与各种数据源和工具之间的安全集成。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/csharp-sdk" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/csharp-sdk</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512074&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=0b788c4855c36cb4888b29798a13d460&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/2ynU3wdFrj06cd_zccI5pg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202457496-536582014.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202504076-257612894.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>JYX2</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;JYX2一个基于 C# Unity 开发的金庸群侠传 3D 重制版是一个回合制战棋战斗开放世界RPG游戏，它是一个非盈利游戏项目，项目目标为重制经典游戏《<span>金庸群侠传》（在线玩DOS原版）并支持后续一系列MOD和二次开发。你可以在PC、MAC或移动手机平台(或其他支持平台)游玩。</span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/jynew/jynew/tree/main/jyx2/Assets/Mods/JYX2" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/jynew/jynew/tree/main/jyx2/Assets/Mods/JYX2</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247513171&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=411ff0c5d89a2d5f5aa34ad87c14af55&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/NZHLApJu0KvlkVNMIySlag</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202531192-2031242337.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202536243-1807904540.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>ApeVolo.Admin</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;ApeVolo.Admin 一款基于.NET 8、SqlSugar、Vue、Elment UI、RBAC、前后端分离、开源（Apache-2.0 license）、开箱即用的企业级中后台权限管理系统。项目具备丰富的组件、简单的逻辑代码、常见的知识点、不仅适用于新手学习、更适用企业级系统开发，助力快速完成常规业务需求开发。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/xianhc/ApeVolo.Admin" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/xianhc/ApeVolo.Admin</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512130&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=91f7d557891cfd4b471dc69182291db8&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/TmJsAVSc_nfNd9f0Zh6YHA</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202608424-511966973.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202616283-521918093.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>TinyWall</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;TinyWall是一款基于 .NET 开源（GPL-3.0 license）、免费、轻量级、用户友好且非侵入性的防火墙软件。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/pylorak/TinyWall" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/pylorak/TinyWall</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512178&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=7e814aadaf8bef46abf1b4c7d91c630f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="wx_text_underline" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Q2_GMFYbbKuxjBO8YNNO4Q</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202644901-521669768.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202649974-623594140.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>YourWeather</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;YourWeather是一个开源（MIT license）、免费的 Blazor 跨平台入门级实战项目，多个项目共用一个<span>Rcl（Razor类库），通过天气API获取当前天气和天气预报，具有多个天气源（高德地图、和风天气 、心知天气等），也可以选择指定位置的天气。</span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Yu-Core/YourWeather" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Yu-Core/YourWeather</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512470&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=f7bb92ef12709e79545026c89e58162e&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/QqG5c26IpfFQT046qmZHdg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202716768-1524317645.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202723208-746770601.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Quasar</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Quasar是一个.NET开源、快速、轻量级远程管理工具。使用范围从用户支持到日常管理工作再到员工监控，Quasar 提供高稳定性和易于使用的用户界面，是您完美的远程管理解决方案。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/quasar/Quasar" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/quasar/Quasar</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512073&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=a7c283dba445483f5d2a49162ff09365&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ppB41HVLFmisdLO07OIsMQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202749318-1620621503.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>FastTunnel</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;FastTunnel是一个.NET开源免费（Apache-2.0）、高性能、跨平台的内网穿透工具，使用它可以实现将内网服务暴露到公网供自己或任何人访问。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/Hgui/FastTunnel" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/Hgui/FastTunnel</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512500&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=5cce8e352e046c7de655ff1c5e7af4b9&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/2sGP4TBcg4j86zOvDCuHKw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202813530-2078867239.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Extended.Wpf.Toolkit</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Extended.Wpf.Toolkit是一款开源、经典、易于使用的 WPF 控件、组件和实用工具集合，专为打造新一代 Windows 应用程序而设计。它能帮助开发者构建经典且外观专业的 WPF 应用程序，对于想要自己编写 WPF UI 界面的同学可以参考借鉴学习。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/xceedsoftware/wpftoolkit" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/xceedsoftware/wpftoolkit</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247513068&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=94738b51ec27db2454c8d1caa30d5050&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/avLIWx6tmS5DLokzLLfurw</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202841336-74067898.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250507202846530-376382468.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
